roleset.name: praise
roleset.note: PRAISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'praise' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.No Verbnet entry. No comparison. (from praise.01-v predicate notes)
PRAISE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb praise.01, VerbNet classes characterize-29.2, judgement-33. Framed by Claire. (from praise.01-n)

example.name: no reason
example.text: [Analysts and consultants]-1 had mixed reactions to yesterday'sannouncements, *trace*-1 praising Mr. Rifenburgh's efforts but questioningwhether the company can survive in a highly competitive marketplace.

example.name: praise for
example.text: Big Board traders praised the Jacobson specialists for gettingthrough yesterday without a trading halt.
example.arg: for getting through yesterday without a trading halt

example.name: praise as
example.text: Mr. Sloan praises the company as recession resistant and notesthat it has an annual earnings growth rate of 32% a year over the pastfive years.

example.name: Fragment, all arguments
example.text: the official 's praise of Clean Harbors for the quality of someof the data in the report
example.arg: for the quality of some of the data in the report

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: He sandwiched his praise of constitutional meat between large loaves of bilious commentary .
